name: Ken'sCulinaryGlossary
0:
”Alexa, ask Chef Ken for the definition of truss”
”Alexa, open Chef Ken”
”Alexa, ask Chef Ken what the definition of evaporation is”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chef ken
des:
There are many culinary specific terms that can be confusing to the beginning chef. Ken W. Alger is a classically trained Chef and provides the definitions to over 100 culinary terms.

You can ask "Alexa, ask Chef Ken for the definition of truss" or "Alexa, ask Chef Ken what the definition of evaporation is".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
